## Mutate

```{r echo=T, eval=T}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
# Changing existing variables
gapminder %>%
	mutate(pop=pop/1000000)

# Use mutate to change lifeExp to be in months
gapminder %>%
	mutate(lifeExp = lifeExp * 12)

# Adding new variables
gapminder %>%
	mutate(grossgdp = pop * gdpPercap)

# Combing 3 verbs
gapminder %>%
	mutate(grossgdp = pop * gdpPercap) %>%
	filter(year==2007) %>%
	arrange(desc(grossgdp))

```
